function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UVC light can pose safety concerns for room occupants if not properly installed or used.","Impact":"Increased risk of skin and eye damage for room occupants.","Mitigation":"Properly install UVGI in mechanical ventilation paths or upper-room applications to indirectly treat air through convective air movement.","Technologies":"UV germicidal irradiation (UVGI) installation in mechanical ventilation paths or upper-room applications.","People":"Room occupants","Owner":"Building maintenance staff and HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Unexplored effects of daylight on indoor viruses and SARS-CoV-2 could lead to a lack of effective mitigation strategies.","Impact":"Inability to effectively mitigate the spread of viruses indoors.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the effects of daylight and develop mitigation strategies based on the findings.","Technologies":"Research on the effects of daylight on indoor viruses and SARS-CoV-2.","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, and public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of spectrally tuned electric lighting for disinfection indoors could lead to ineffective virus inactivation.","Impact":"Ineffective reduction of infectious aerosols and survivability of viruses indoors.","Mitigation":"Proper implementation of spectrally tuned electric lighting for disinfection indoors based on research and best practices.","Technologies":"Spectrally tuned electric lighting for disinfection indoors.","People":"Building maintenance staff, engineers, and facility managers","Owner":"Building management and engineering professionals"}]}
